DOC.brief_summary: To investigate weight loss effect mild calorie restriction circulating level liver enzymes nondiabetic overweight subject high visceral fat area [ visceral fat area ( VFA ) L4 ≥ 100 cm² ] .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Loss Effect Circulating Liver Enzymes
DOC.detailed_description: A 12-week randomized , placebo-controlled study conduct 80 nondiabetic overweight subject high VFA . The participant divide two group : 12-week mild calorie restriction ( 300 kcal/day intake reduction , n=40 ) treatment ( control , n=40 ) . The randomization accord computer-generated block randomization ( placebo : test = 1:1 ) . Before intervention period , venous blood sample obtain subject , biochemical parameter include circulate liver enzymes measure .
DOC.criteria: Able give inform consent 2060 year old Males female Overweight ( 25.0 kg/m²≤ BMI < 30 kg/m² ) Absence pregnancy breastfeed Stable body weight ( body weight change < 1kg 3 month screen ) High visceral fat ( VFA ) L4 ( VFA L4 ≥100 cm² ) Without hypertension , type 2 diabetes , cardiovascular disease , thyroid disease No use medication affect body weight , energy expenditure , glucose control last 6 month Prior history Cushing syndrome malignancy Prior history liver disease include chronic viral hepatitis , autoimmune hepatitis , primary biliary cirrhosis , druginduced liver disease Excess alcohol intake ( base WHO standard ) History intentional reduction weight precede 6 month
